description:
Drupal is a free, open-source web development platform for online content and user communities. It powers some of the busiest sites on the web, and can be adapted to virtually any design. Drupal runs over a million sites, including WhiteHouse, World Economic Forum, Stanford University, and Examiner. Drupal over the past years has become the most favorite CMS large corporations choose for their enterprise solutions. This course explains every aspect of Drupal Step by Step.

Why you should learn Drupal?

  • Easy to use (even if you don't know html, php...)
  • Lots of modules
  • Lots of themes
  • Great established user community
  • You can make a website in terms of hours, even minutes
title: Learn Drupal Step by Step from Scratch
